TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontStretch extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: Describe el grado hasta el que se ha ajustado una fuente comparado con su relación de aspecto normal.

span.span: Describes the degree to which a font has been stretched compared to the normal aspect ratio of that font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un ajuste de fuente describe el grado al que un formato de fuente se expande desde su relación de aspecto normal, que es el ancho original respecto a la proporción del alto especificado para los glifos de la fuente.A font stretch describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font. El valores se corresponden con los `usWidthClass` definición en el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] especificación.The values correspond to the `usWidthClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. El `usWidthClass` representa un valor entero entre 1 y 9, los valores más bajos indican anchos más estrechos; valores más altos indican anchos más anchos.The `usWidthClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 9—lower values indicate narrower widths; higher values indicate wider widths. |Ajuste de fuenteFont stretch|usWidthClassusWidthClass|% del tamaño normal% of normal| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| ||11|50.0%50.0%| ||22|62.5%62.5%| ||33|75.0%75.0%| ||44|87.5%87.5%| ||55|100.0%100.0%| ||66|112.5%112.5%| ||77|125.0%125.0%| ||88|150.0%150.0%| ||99|200.0%200.0%| Para obtener más información sobre la [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` valor, consulte la ["Tablas de archivos de fuente"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) sección de la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] especificación.For more information on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` value, see the ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) section of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. ## Uso de atributos XAMLXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static int Compare (System.Windows.FontStretch left, System.Windows.FontStretch right);
.method public static hidebysig int32 Compare(valuetype System.Windows.FontStretch left, valuetype System.Windows.FontStretch right) cil managed
Public Shared Function Compare (left As FontStretch, right As FontStretch) As Integer
public: static int Compare(System::Windows::FontStretch left, System::Windows::FontStretch right);

param.name: left
param.span: Primer objeto que se va a comparar.

span.span: The first object to compare.

param.name: right
param.span: Segundo objeto que se va a comparar.

span.span: The second object to compare.
Compares two instances of objects.

returns.span: Valor que representa la relación entre las dos instancias de .

span.span: An value that represents the relationship between the two instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando el valor devuelto es menor que cero, `left` o menor que `right`.When the return value is less than zero, `left` is less than `right`. Cuando este valor es cero, indica que ambos operandos son iguales.When this value is zero, it indicates that both operands are equal. Cuando el valor es mayor que cero, indica que `left` es mayor que `right`.When the value is greater than zero, it indicates that `left` is greater than `right`.
